personalInfo.title: Senior Software Engineer
personalInfo.summary: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years of expertise in full-stack development, specializing in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Proven track record of delivering scalable solutions and optimizing application performance.

achievements: Thesis: 'Optimizing Neural Networks for Edge Computing'
Teaching Assistant for Algorithms and Data Structures
Dean's List all semesters
Capstone Project: Distributed File System

experience.description: Lead developer for enterprise SaaS platform serving 500+ clients.
achievements: Led the development of a microservices architecture that improved system reliability by 40%.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time from hours to minutes.
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to ensure code quality.

experience.description: Full-stack developer for customer-facing web applications.
achievements: Developed responsive web applications using React and Redux.
Optimized database queries resulting in 30% faster application performance.
Collaborated with UX designers to implement intuitive user interfaces.

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce solution with React, Node.js, and MongoDB
achievements: Implemented secure payment processing with Stripe
Built responsive UI that works across all devices
Integrated inventory management system

projects.name: AI Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Built a machine learning model to provide personalized product recommendations
achievements: Achieved 35% improvement in recommendation relevance
Deployed as microservice using Docker and AWS
Processed over 1M user interactions daily

projects.name: Open Source Contribution
projects.description: Active contributor to several open-source projects in the JavaScript ecosystem
achievements: Contributed to React ecosystem libraries
Fixed critical bugs in popular npm packages
Created developer tools to improve workflow

awards.title: Innovation Award

volunteer.description: Contribute to open-source projects that help local governments better serve their communities.
